Uses of Interface
inra.ijpb.data.border.BorderManager3D

  • Packages that use BorderManager3D 
    Package Description
    inra.ijpb.data.border
    Management of pixels outside image bounds.
    inra.ijpb.plugins
    Contains plugins, for integration with ImageJ GUI.

    • Uses of BorderManager3D in inra.ijpb.data.border

      Classes in inra.ijpb.data.border that implement BorderManager3D 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantBorder3D
      Returns either image pixel when position is inside image bounds, or a constant value when position is outside of image bounds.
      class  MirroringBorder3D
      Periodic border that considers image is mirrored indefinitely in all directions.
      class  PeriodicBorder3D
      Periodic border that considers image is repeated indefinitely in all directions.
      class  ReplicatedBorder3D
      Assess pixel outside image bounds have same value as the closest pixel on image border.
      Methods in inra.ijpb.data.border that return BorderManager3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BorderManager3D BorderManager3D.Type.createBorderManager(ij.ImageStack image) 

    • Uses of BorderManager3D in inra.ijpb.plugins

      Methods in inra.ijpb.plugins with parameters of type BorderManager3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ij.ImageStack ExtendBordersPlugin.process(ij.ImageStack image, int left, int right, int top, int bottom, int front, int back, BorderManager3D border)
      Adds the specified number of pixels around the input image, and returns the resulting image.
